# Client-Hints-ebay

Provides config and backgroud timer for pulling config for client hints.

## Usage

```
    npm install client-hints-ebay
```

## APIs

** getClientHintConfig() ** returns config object

```
const ch = require('client-hints-ebay');
const config = ch.getClientHintConfig();

config.isEnabled()
config.getCHRequestHeaders()
config.getCHChainHeaders()
config.getCHAcceptHeaders()

```
